channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Mother's Day
channel.desc: Romance 2016 In the days before Mother's Day, three women, each dealing with her life's challenges, come together and realize they don't have to face their struggles alone. Through their connection, they discover a wellspring of support, strength, and empathy. Jennifer Aniston, Timothy Olyphant, Shay Mitchell, Caleb Brown, Brandon Spink, Garry Marshall, Anya Kochoff, Matthew Walker.
